jcr:content.jcr:title: List of British armies in World War II

contentheadline.headline: List of British armies in World War II

contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=May 2009}} {{British Army lists}} This page is a list of '''British Armies in World War II'''. It is intended to provide a central point to access information about British formations of that size. * [[British First Army|First Army]] * [[British Second Army|Second Army]] * [[British Eighth Army|Eighth Army]] * [[British Ninth Army|Ninth Army]] * [[British Tenth Army|Tenth Army]] * [[British Twelfth Army|Twelfth Army]] * [[British Fourteenth Army|Fourteenth Army]] ==See also== *[[British Army Groups in World War II]] [[Category:Lists of military units and formations of World War II]] [[Category:Field armies of the United Kingdom]] [[Category:Military units and formations of the British Army in World War II]] [[Category:Lists of British Army units and formations|Wor]]
